message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
I think we can do better, let's meet in the middle!
I understand you want to meet in the middle, but the value decreases for me each round. I'll take $55, you take $45.  This is a fair offer considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation is affecting you, I'll take a bit more. It's still a good deal for you!
Bob, the clock is ticking and this money is rapidly losing value for me. I need to secure a decent amount. I'm offering you $48 - take it before it shrinks further!
I know the inflation is hurting you, but I'm not going to give in. This is my best offer so far.
